title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: When restarting the workbench, the Most Recently Used (MRU) file list is not displayed.
EB: After restarting the workbench, the MRU file list should be displayed and contain the previously opened files.
SR:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench and observe the MRU file list.
